price: Quando seu Senhor lhe disse: "Islamiza-te." Disse: "Islamizo-me, para O Senhor dos mundos".
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥٓ أَسۡلِمۡۖ قَالَ أَسۡلَمۡتُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahu rabbuhu aslim qāla aslamtu lirabbi al-ʿālamīna
